participant_1.name: Liam Johnson
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, Liam enjoys engaging in light-hearted conversations. He often has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: Liam grew up in a small town and moved to the city for work. He has a background in graphic design and loves art.

participant_2.name: Sophia Martinez
participant_2.personality: Sophia is witty and outgoing, often using humor to connect with others. She is also quite empathetic and enjoys helping friends.
participant_2.background: Sophia is a city dweller with a degree in psychology. She has a passion for volunteering and community service.
